department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: Installation of Outboard Engines and Associated Products (Inboard, Front and Rear) by Authorized Users and Original Equipment Manufacturers, delivery to Canada, GKU - Canada - Fed/Gov only.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Title
PSIB - Outboard Motors

## Tender Number
E60ML-230001/H

## Tender Status
[Expired]

## Tender Closing Date
2023-11-01T14:00:00

## Tender Description
Canada has a requirement to establish a standing offer for the supply of commercial brands of outboard motors, inboard motors, and stern drives with their parts and accessories under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). The procurement strategy involves providing Authority to Buy (ATB) documentation to Federal Identified Users and Provincial/Territorial Identified Users for deliveries across Canada, except areas subject to Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements (CLCAs), on an as-and-when requested basis.

## Delivery Information
The contract will be delivered in the following regions across Canada: 
- Quebec (except NCR), 
- Yukon, 
- Ontario (except NCR), 
- Alberta, 
- Prince Edward Island, 
- Manitoba, 
- Saskatchewan, 
- National Capital Region (NCR), 
- Northwest Territories, 
- Nova Scotia, 
- British Columbia, 
- New Brunswick, and 
- Newfoundland and Labrador.

## Procurement Details
The procurement strategy is: Lowest Price.

## Document Requirements
Documents may be submitted in either English or French.

## Contact Information
Contact details:
- Name: Alex Haydock
- Email: alex.haydock@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- Phone: (343) 598-1292

Please note the tender announcement is in [Expired] status, which means it is no longer open for submissions. 

### Attachments
Please refer to the following links for tender attachment documents:
- [Attachment 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/10/12/e14ff546290f0bd286867c5aad2f973c/ABES.PROD.PW__ML.B068.E29179.EBSU001.PDF)
- [Attachment 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/09/26/c70e81960e0f24ab3529e15b5ec0ba22/ABES.PROD.PW__ML.B068.E29179.EBSU000.PDF)

Please be advised these attachments are subject to change. It is the bidder's responsibility to verify attachment information prior to bidding submission.
